install.name: Joomfish - Basic Router
install.author: Joom!Fish Project
install.description: When activated this bot provides language determination and basic routing. Must be enabled unless you are using a SEF plugin that performs the same tasks.

param.name: determitLanguage
param.label: Enable Language determination
param.description: If an unkown user comes to your site - try to determinate the language based on the browser settings.

param.name: newVisitorAction
param.label: Language selection for new visitors?
param.description: Determine language selection for new visitors (only Enable Language determination is 'Yes')
param.option: Ordering of Languages in Joomfish Component

param.name: use302redirect
param.label: Use 302 redirect
param.description: For new users the redirection to the correct language is done by automatic integration or an official 302 redirect to a different URL such as www.yourdomain.com/en

param.name: enableCookie
param.description: Switch off the cookie only if you have a different solution to define the once selected language, e.g. via an URL.
param.label: Save user language in a cookie
